text: Luther V. Harris Jr. (August 27, 1923 – February 3, 1986) was an American professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball League for the Sheboygan Red Skins and Tri-Cities Blackhawks and averaged 6.7 points per game. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:1986 deaths Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Illinois Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:Guards (basketball) Category:People from Madison County, Illinois Category:Sheboygan Red Skins players Category:Tri-Cities Blackhawks players
title: Luther Harris
